S

scenes - package scenes
 
screenHeight - Static variable in class scenes.GameScene
Screen's height dimension.
screenWidth - Static variable in class scenes.GameScene
Screen's width dimension.
setAttitude(String) - Method in class utilities.AnimatedSprite
Sets the attitude's property value.
setCollision(boolean) - Method in class tiles.Tile
Sets the collision's property value based on the collision parameter.
setCollision(String) - Method in class entities.Hero
Is called every time a collision is detected between the Hero's hit box and a platform object.
setInteract(boolean) - Method in class entities.Hero
Modify the Hero's possibility to interact with other elements.
setSpawnCoordinates(double, double) - Method in class entities.Hero
Is used to teleport the hero at a point defined by the X and Y parameters.
setX(double) - Method in class entities.Entity
 
setY(double) - Method in class entities.Entity
 
speed - Variable in class entities.Entity
Entity's reference speed on both X and Y axes.
Spike - Class in tiles
 
Spike(String, double, double, boolean) - Constructor for class tiles.Spike
Creates a Spike object at X and Y coordinates with the provided collision property and an ImageView provided by the fileName image.
sprite - Variable in class entities.AnimatedThing
An object that allows you to display multiple sprite animation.
start(Stage) - Method in class main.Main
Updates the Scene to be shown on the Screen by modifying the Stage's scene value based on the actualLevel and actualRoom parameters.
